newsitem.title: TURKEY: Turk Tupras buys 55kt gasoline, sells 20kt naphtha.
newsitem.headline: Turk Tupras buys 55kt gasoline, sells 20kt naphtha.

text.p: Turkey's state oil refinery Tupras awarded two tenders to buy a total of 55,000 tonnes of gasoline and another to sell 20,000 tonnes of naphtha, it said in a statement.
It said the company will import 30,000 tonnes of gasoline for a premium of minus $5.25 per tonne from Vitol to be delivered at Izmit between April 11-13.
It will also buy 25,000 tonnes of gasoline from the Dutch company Trafigura at a premium of minus $5.36 per tonne. The delivery will be on April 24-26.
Tupras will sell Glencore 20,000 tonnes of naphtha from Izmir port to be loaded on April 9-11 at a premium plus $7.11 per tonne, it said.
All three tenders were issued on March 25.
